item.title: Help with this code not sure if its correct
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

alright this is what you should try

if (command.startsWith("syell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >=1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "System Message -"+command.substring(5); }

you don’t need the replace all and the mute because a mod+ shouldnt be muted or advertising.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this code not sure if its correct
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“syell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >=1)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
             {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "System Message -"+command.substring(5);
}    [/code]

try that… and i’m not sure you need the replace all because if you’re making it so a mod+ can only use this command, it would be pretty stupid of them to try to advertise another server.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this code not sure if its correct
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay i wantted to add a syell command and i added it and theres no errors when i compiled but its not working when i use the command why is that? heres the code

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“syell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >=1)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "System Message -"+command.substring(5);
}[/code]

Read full topic
